choose.otherwise: SELECT ab.approval_box_id, ab.approval_box_name FROM approval_box ab join box_use_department bud ON bud.approval_box_id = ab.approval_box_id join company c ON bud.use_id = c.comp_id AND bud.using_category = 'C' WHERE c.comp_id = #{company};

mapper.select: SELECT ab.approval_box_id, c.comp_id,c.comp_name, ab.approval_box_name, ab.approval_box_used_status, ab.menu_using_range, ab.sort_order FROM approval_box ab JOIN box_use_department bud ON bud.approval_box_id = ab.approval_box_id JOIN company c ON (c.comp_id = bud.use_id AND using_category = 'C') WHERE ab.box_delete_status != 1 AND ab.approval_box_id =#{boxId};
